name: Margherita Pizza
shortDescription: A classic Italian pizza with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.
fullDescription: Margherita Pizza is a traditional Italian favorite that combines the simplicity of fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil, all baked to perfection on a crisp, thin crust. Its light and fresh flavors make it a timeless dish.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
shortDescription: An American favorite with spicy pepperoni and gooey cheese.
fullDescription: Pepperoni Pizza is a go-to for pizza lovers across the world, featuring a generous layer of spicy, flavorful pepperoni on top of melted mozzarella cheese and a classic pizza crust. Perfect for lunch or dinner, it's a favorite for a reason.

name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
shortDescription: Smoky BBQ sauce with grilled chicken and melted cheese.
fullDescription: BBQ Chicken Pizza brings together the bold flavors of grilled chicken, smoky BBQ sauce, and a gooey cheese topping, all served on a crispy crust. This hearty pizza offers a delicious mix of savory and sweet flavors, making it a popular choice for dinner.

name: Hawaiian Pizza
shortDescription: Sweet pineapple and savory ham on a cheesy pizza base.
fullDescription: Hawaiian Pizza is a delightful combination of sweet and savory, featuring juicy pineapple chunks and savory ham on top of a cheesy, crispy pizza crust. This unique pizza balances flavors in a way that's loved by many for lunch or dinner.

name: Buffalo Chicken Pizza
shortDescription: Spicy buffalo chicken with blue cheese sauce on a crispy crust.
fullDescription: Buffalo Chicken Pizza combines the heat of buffalo sauce with tender chicken and a creamy blue cheese dressing, all layered on a crispy crust. It's a fiery, tangy, and delicious pizza option, perfect for those who love bold flavors.

name: Vegetables Pizza
shortDescription: A healthy and colorful pizza topped with fresh vegetables.
fullDescription: Vegetables Pizza is a delicious and healthy option, loaded with a variety of fresh vegetables like bell peppers, onions, and tomatoes, all baked on a crispy crust. It's a great choice for those looking for a lighter, flavorful pizza.

name: Meat Lovers Pizza
shortDescription: A hearty pizza loaded with various types of meats.
fullDescription: Meat Lovers Pizza is packed with a rich assortment of meats, including pepperoni, sausage, ham, and bacon, all layered on a cheesy pizza crust. It's a filling and satisfying choice for meat enthusiasts and those seeking a protein-rich meal.

name: Cheese Pizza
shortDescription: Classic pizza with a generous layer of melted cheese.
fullDescription: Cheese Pizza is a timeless classic, featuring a crispy crust covered in a thick layer of melted mozzarella cheese. It's simple, delicious, and perfect for cheese lovers who appreciate the traditional flavors of pizza.

name: Supreme Pizza
shortDescription: A loaded pizza with a variety of meats, veggies, and cheeses.
fullDescription: Supreme Pizza is a fully-loaded pizza, packed with a variety of toppings including pepperoni, sausage, bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, and olives, all topped with a generous amount of cheese. It's the perfect choice for those who want a bit of everything.

name: Four Seasons Pizza
shortDescription: A gourmet pizza divided into four sections with seasonal toppings.
fullDescription: Four Seasons Pizza is a unique and gourmet pizza, divided into four sections, each representing a different season with distinct toppings. This pizza offers a diverse range of flavors in one, making it an exciting choice for adventurous eaters.
